author: Gary Parizek
comment: Really a nice watch face tells me everything that I need to know
title: I like it

author: Chris Kendall
comment: I hate watch faces which look great when on but look awful when the watch goes dim.. this one stays looking gorgeous in both states.. it looks great and I haven't noticed any increase in battery drainage than usual. This may be because I prefer watch faces with full colour when dim. Love it.
title: Gorgeous

author: Scott Cole
comment: I'm giving you a 4 because I really like the watch face design, but the dimmed display kills the battery life. I'd like to see the dimmed display greatly refined or I would like to uninstall and receive a refund because I can't use as is.
title: Rework the dimmed display

author: Alex Sireteanu
comment: One of the nicer watch faces but it will destroy your battery. Maybe it's because of the use of colour during sleep mode?
title: Eats Battery

author: Matthew Dumas
comment: Seeing that the date is at the top it would be great if the weather was integrated somehow and Aldo if it could be completely dimmed to a black and white screen once sleeping...
title: I like it but...

author: mark dobson
comment: cant wait to see more from you. *cough* A06
title: awesome

author: Jamie MacFarlane
comment: How the hell do I now remove this from my watch.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.

Please take followings.

- Tap to wake the PlayStore app first.
- Expand the context menu by sliding your finger left to right.
- Tap 'My apps'
- You can find 'A29 WatchFace for android wear'
- Tap 'Uninstall' (Before you use it, 'Refund')

Thank you.

title: How the hell
